0: The central location of the Shangri La in Singapore allows easy access to nearly every attraction Singapore offers
We have stayed at this hotel previously because of its great location and good service
We were always able to get a cab quickly out front and found transportation around the city simple and safe
The location is great just a 5 minute walk from orchard road and it is very confortable
The hotel does provide shuttle bus to the shopping malls which is convenient
Location clean and spacious rooms club facilities gym pool wifi and the White Rabbit lollies on the counter are our favourites
it is a good location and views but needs reinvention

I went to Singapore for 2 3 years ago and I stayed at this hotel because it near the Sentosa and we can ride a shuttle bus from the hotel to harbor front which also free because the bus is operated by the hotel and the view from my room is amazing
On a positive note the breakfast at The Line restaurant was really good and the rooms were of a high standard the hotel is also in a good location
1: My only suggestion for improvement is to make the physical stops of the shuttle bus more obvious in the shopping malls visited we simply could not find our way back to our original stop using the bus timetable and routing map

I understand the establishment is regarded as a luxury hotel but it is clear that the shuttle service is meant to cater to the vacationing family and not necessarily the business traveler that is working off campus
Location is a little remote and there is usually a queue of people waiting for taxis not the other way around
The place had the atmosphere of an overcrowded bus station
Really an oasis to escape the hustle of the crowded and busy downtown Singapore
Perhaps not the best value as if was extremely expensive and not in the best location for transport or main Singapore attractions
We tried to take free shuttle bus to orchard road
You can take a free shuttle at set times to Orchard row or you can walk there in 10 minutes
The only down side is the location especially if you want to use the MRT which is 15mins walk away however you can get a cab from outside anytime
